desc.module.iron_plating: Iron Plating for an armor piece, provides moderate protection
desc.module.diamond_plating: Diamond Plating for an armor piece, provides a large amount of protection
desc.module.compass: An electronic compass can now be displayed on the HUD
desc.module.clock: An electronic clock can be displayed on the HUD to tell the time
desc.module.light: A photoresistor allows for light level detection
desc.module.rebreather: An integrated rebreather allows for increased oxygen supply during underwater expeditions
desc.module.elytra: An artifact of the End City can be integrated into the chestplate, giving it's abilities while keeping the armor's properties
desc.module.damage: Implanted artificial muscles allow for increased attack damage
desc.module.speed: Implanted artificial muscle allows for increased movement speed
desc.module.fall_resist: Implanted gel pads protect against fall damage
desc.module.jump: Implanted artificial muscle allows for increased jump height
